UI__SPLASH_SCREEN__WELCOME_MESSAGE: Hi and welcome to Elaisa, your language level search engine. I want to give you an advice on how to use it to receive the best results for your needs.
UI__SPLASH_SCREEN__CAPTION: You can search for articles and documents in the languages Spanish, German and English. To only get the best articles for you, specify your current level of speaking for each language.
UI__SPLASH_SCREEN__IMPORTANT_NOTICE__TEX: You have to define all three fields to search for documents, since they are all dependent on each other.
UI__FOOTER_ONE__TITLE: Discover the world of languages with Elaisa
UI__FOOTER_ONE__TEXT1: Learning a new language is always a big challenge, but it can be a bit easier - with Elaisa. As is known, a language can only be mastered if it is used regularly, ie it is used in a conversation or for reading appropriate literature. The problem with conventional learning materials is the outdated state of the respective texts. Textbooks often develop their own stories to explain the various topics of a conversation by means of self-contained stories. Unfortunately, this has nothing to do with actuality.
UI__FOOTER_ONE__TEXT2: Therefore, Elaisa provides the functionality to search for current articles and websites of a desired language. The own language level can be specified directly in order to keep or even expand one's own level of knowledge.
UI__FOOTER_TWO__SUBTITLE: We've listed a few helpful links so you can easily find your dream language.
UI__FOOTER_LEGAL: Elaisa - Language Level Search Engine - All rights reserved - 2019
